Articles.Content:
You get absorbed by the planet and crash the game.

Or when your Kerbal freezes like a statue and slides about in a wacky pose.
When you can't return to space center.

when your Kerbal freezes like a statue and slides about in a wacky pose.

Time warping(the non-physical one) can help here in most cases(unless it happens on something floating or flying, then it's just supposed to be this way).
When you get trapped in the VAB or SPH by KLF

Or when your Kerbal freezes like a statue and slides about in a wacky pose.

One of the funniest and yet most inconvenient glitches out.

If you're lucky, you still can use the rocket pack, but with no hands, making it look weird.
When you send an interplanetary mission to Jool, only to find out that your ship got the docking port glitch and you have to scrap the whole mission.
When you time warp towards reentry and the game doesn't switch it off like it normally does.
When your ship loses all orbital velocity and drops straight down.
When you go to turn off symmetry and it keeps getting bigger... and bigger... and bigger.

Is this only for KSP glitches?

When your heat shield gets flung away from kerbin at ~5 times the speed of light.

That awkward glitch when you return to Kerbin after a year-long mission to put some useless crap on Dune, land safely, quicksave, later quickload, and find your ship headed interstellar in this form:

I just returned home damnit! I'm not mentally prepared for an unpowered interstellar mission!

Edited July 7, 2014 by Overfloater

when you speak some languages with foreign caracters at random and translate afterward . , ;

Edited May 16, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

When you see something in the distance near minmus, peer at it, wonder what it is, realise that its big, realise that its HUGE, realise that its the kilometres-wide remnant of a glitched out kerbal that got cloned and abandoned in space a few missions ago who now resembles a colossal framework pyramid, like a floating space temple. Or something.

That glitch when you close KSP and turn on Orbiter.

"Oh, WHOOPS! TOTALLY didn't mean that to happen!"

... when you forgot about coffee and cereale after woke up

http://imgur.com/Ygy9lBZ.jpg (well fair enough xDr)

that, happen ... i take over the network xDr

meeeeh, stuck between 2 tables that appear to warmongering each day ... wow this escalated quicly /half side in&out like if ...

Edited May 17, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
